TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content: it looks GREAT!
OoOooOo.. The parts have a specular map... Rebooting to Windows and gonna play in Photoshop..

The Alnair seems pretty finished, I don't know what you have to do with the progress yet(maybe a black alt tex), and are the docking ports finished yet? I saw something about IVAs for them, what does that mean?

Speaking of libra, When is that ever gonna get an update? That poor thing's been neglected.

Few .cfg files need tweaking, few textures need cleaning up. But that's it.

Docking port IVA is the cat-5 interior.

The poor Libra is due an update, its true. But so is the Vega and The Spica. I have a soft spot for the LK, but its tricky deciding what's first in line.

OoOooOo.. The parts have a specular map... Rebooting to Windows and gonna play in Photoshop..

Haha Yes, you can go full matte if you wish.

I was thinking the opposite..

Full white alpha

Add some texturing to mimic the insulation on the outside of the real one

Subtle wrinkles to complete the illusion

In a Kerbal way of course. Only so much I can do just manipulating textures..

Tantares Version 4.0 Release!

Happy to say it's out!

New release contains Progress and the TKS.

Out of the box, this mod supports RemoteTech2, KAS, deadly re-entry and Raster Prop Monitor!

Also alternate textures are available for all craft!

I relegated some of the older craft into a separate download and GameData folder, they will be gradually updated to the new standard. I've balanced costs and weights, etc. for career mode, so they are still usable for now.

These craft have support for deadly re-entry out of the box.

These are:

  • Vega
  • Spica
  • Libra
  • Polaris

Please enjoy the TKS and let me know if there are any issues.

I'll be on hiatus for a week, but I'll check the forums when I can!
Looks good, downloading new update and going to test Thank you for the update.

Tantares Version 4.0 Release!

Happy to say it's out!

New release contains Progress and the TKS.

Out of the box, this mod supports RemoteTech2, KAS, deadly re-entry and Raster Prop Monitor!

Also alternate textures are available for all craft!

I relegated some of the older craft into a separate download and GameData folder, they will be gradually updated to the new standard. I've balanced costs and weights, etc. for career mode, so they are still usable for now.

These craft have support for deadly re-entry out of the box.

These are:

  • Vega
  • Spica
  • Libra
  • Polaris

Please enjoy the TKS and let me know if there are any issues.

I'll be on hiatus for a week, but I'll check the forums when I can!
